programme.title: Coconut The Little Dragon - EP 0029 & 0030
programme.desc: Fire Dragon Coconut, Gourmet Dragon Oscar and porcupine Matilda are always up for adventure! Life is not always easy on Dragon Island - Coconut has flying problems, Oscar is the only vegetarian in his family and Matilda has no say as a porcupine on Dragon Island anyway. Nevertheless the little ones prove that sometimes the smallest can be the biggest!

programme.title: Chirp - EP 0035 & 0036
programme.desc: Chirp, Tweet and Squawk are three best friends who use their imaginations and everyday objects to get them into--and out of--fantastically fun adventures and hilariously sticky predicaments.

programme.title: Teddies 2 - EP 5
programme.desc: Sparky thinks that she may be too boring for her friends, so she transforms into Sparkles her alter ego. Sparkles is everything that Sparky isn't. It's fun at first, but soon her friends miss Sparky and want her back. Later, Teddy Driver Meeks and Running Tizzy compete in an epic race to decide who is the fastest teddy in Teddytown. The race is on!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S2 - EP 24
programme.desc: Whenever there's trouble, just yelp for help! Ryder and the PAW Patrol will be there to save the day in Adventure Bay! From a baby owl to a runaway monkey to Mayor Goodway herself, Marshall, Chase, Rubble, Skye, Zuma, and Rocky are always ready to lend a paw.

programme.title: Ready Jet Go! - EP 0047 & 0048
programme.desc: Ready Jet Go! follows two neighborhood kids: Sean, who has an all-consuming drive for science facts, and Sydney, who has a passion for science fiction and imagination. They both befriend the new kid on their street, Jet Propulsion, whose family members happen to be aliens! Together, they embark on great adventures, exploring the solar system, learning about space and science, but always back just in time for dinner!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S3 - EP 18
programme.desc: Make a splash with the third swim-sational season of Bubble Guppies! Join them as they discover all kinds of animals, from Australia to the Arctic, from dolphins to elephants, from bullfrogs and bees to a Bubble Kitty!

programme.title: Everyday Gourmet With Justine Schofield S6 - EP 1
programme.desc: Hosted by popular series one MasterChef contestant, Justine Schofield. Everyday Gourmet presents can-do cooking ideas as well as tips, tricks and insights into making us all more confident in the kitchen. Justine believes when it comes to cooking, a little bit of confidence goes a long way, and shell spend most of the time building up your confidence in the kitchen.

programme.title: Martha Bakes S6 - EP 1
programme.desc: Martha shares her best tips and techniques with viewers, giving them the confidence to create the finest desserts and delectable baked goods in their own kitchens. From Martha's favourite breakfast recipes to puddings and cookies, Martha's updated versions of the classics will set the standard.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune 36 - EP 6843
programme.desc: (Encore) Wheel Of Fortune is an American television game show created by Merv Griffin. The show features a competition in which contestants solve word puzzles, similar to those used in Hangman, to win cash and prizes determined by spinning a giant carnival wheel.

programme.title: 亲 Kin - EP 217
programme.desc: Deanna has a great day planning for Ananya's wedding dress with Nathan and Nina. Zaryn gets anxious when he learns that James intends to investigate a potential leak within the company. Carrie reveals Matthew's investigation in front of Ah Yoke, forcing Matthew to cook up a lie.

programme.title: The Dr Oz Show 10 - EP 165
programme.desc: Cheaper chicken products at the supermarket: what to choose and what to avoid; chemicals in pool floats; the Dish crew -- Daphne Oz, Jamika Pessoa, Laila Ali, Maria Menounos and special guest Dania Ramirez -- bring recipes for a backyard barbecue.

programme.title: All Over The Workplace 2 - EP 4
programme.desc: All Over The Workplace offers children a unique opportunity to explore what it is really like to do the jobs they dream about when they get older. In each episode, two children get to do just that, meeting various celebrities and well-known role models along the way. They even manage to try doing the job for real, often with funny and mind-boggling outcomes!

programme.title: LEGO Friends 2018 - Girls On A Mission - EP 0003 & 0004
programme.desc: Meet Andrea, Mia, Emma, Olivia and Stephanie. They're five best friends. And they're on a heroic mission: to save Heartlake City from wily swindlers!

programme.title: Bottersnikes & Gumbles - EP 0047 & 0048
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three Gumble heroes, Tink, Bounce and Willi, who love nothing better than to 'gumble' all day long which means crazy, stretchy capers around their junk valley while carefully avoiding getting tin-canned by their stinky, grumpy, lazy neighbours the Bottersnikes. Full of action, suspense and laughs!

programme.title: Lolirock S2 - EP 12
programme.desc: More magical and musical adventures of Iris and her 2 best friends, bound together by their destinies as magical princesses and a fight against injustice.

Asia is home to the best martial artists on the planet. Our mission is to unleash real life superheroes who ignite Asia with hope, dreams, inspiration and strength.

Many years after Baryon's defeat, a carefree boy named Rex comes across the Tuner and becomes the new Dino Master. Meanwhile, Darkno takes over one planet after another and finally reaches Earth.

programme.title: Super4orce - EP 4

programme.desc: "Discover The Great Silk Road" is a large-scale travelogue spanning the three continents of Europe, Asia and Africa. Follow the host Marco Liao as he starts his breath-taking journey from China's Xi'an through the Northern Silk Road to the path taken by Admiral Zheng He. 发现大丝路是一个横跨欧亚非三大洲的大型文化旅游节目，主持人廖科溢从中国西安出发，走过充满伊斯兰风情的北方丝路，穿越蜀身毒道，看见南方丝路文化，最后寻郑和下西洋的路线见证海上丝路的辉煌。.

programme.title: 前线追踪 Frontline - EP 20
programme.desc: (R) Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong announced the increase in retirement and re-employment age of workers in Singapore during his National Day Rally speech. What are the responses from older workers and how will small and medium sized companies be affected? What can be done to ensure that these older workers stay relevant to the changing needs of the workforce? The Government will also increase bursary subsidies to make tertiary education even more affordable for lower and middle-income families. How will these families benefit? (重)李显龙总理在国庆群众大会上宣布提高退休和重新雇佣年龄。年长员工对此有什么看法？中小型企业会如何受到影响？要怎么确保年长工友能够与时并进，满足劳动队伍未来的需求？此外，政府也将大幅提高助学金来补贴大专学费，帮助中低收入家庭的孩子负担得起良好的大专教育。这些家庭能如何受惠？.

programme.title: 武神赵子龙 Chinese Hero Zhao Zilong - EP 0049 & 0050
programme.desc: (R) Fei Yan kills Geng Chun in revenge of her father, whose death was unknown to her till now. Meantime, Sun Quan and Zhou Yu scheme to take Liu Bei hostage and force him to give up Jing Zhou to them. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)至今方知父亲已逝，飞燕手刃耿纯以报父仇。与此同时，孙权与周瑜阴谋挟持刘备，以逼他献出荆州。.

programme.title: 双子星 The Ultimatum - EP 0005 & 0006
programme.desc: (R) Zheng Wen Yu was pregnant when she was taken advantage of by her boss Ye Song Nian, the CEO of Phoenix Corporation. Both Wen Yu and Song Nian's wife gave birth to daughters in the same hospital. As fate will have it, the hospital made a mistake and swapped the babies. Because Wen Yu's daughter was diagnosed with congenital heart disease, she kept silent about the mistake so that her daughter can receive the best medical care with Song Nian's wealth. (重)三十多年前，凤凰集团老板叶松年强暴了原已怀孕的郑文玉，满心怨恨的文玉遂故意让自己和对方二姨太同时出世的女儿－叶予晨、方宋乔身份对调。宋乔在文玉泄恨打骂之下，度过悲苦的童年；予晨长大后则在凤凰集团身居要职。.

programme.title: 那年花开月正圆 Nothing Gold Can Stay - EP 0063 & 0064
programme.desc: (R) Zhou Ying gives Yu Cheng a new name - Huai Xian. Disliking the new place, Huai Xian does his utmost to behave in a naughty way, hoping that he will be sent back home as a result. But Zhou Ying exercises her patience and tolerance towards Huai Xian which disarms him into accepting her. (PG)(重)周莹为玉成改名为怀先。由于不喜欢东院这个新环境，怀先使劲大吵大闹，希望藉此获得被遣送回家的机会。谁知周莹治子有方，弄得怀先不得不乖乖就范。.

programme.title: 玩家万岁 Home Makeover - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) In this hilarious and entertaining home renovation program, join Mark Lee, Kym Ng, and Ben Yeo as they aspire to give a makeover to homes, and bring joy to the homeowners' faces. (重)《玩家万岁》由李国煌、钟琴和杨志龙主持，每集到访不同的家庭，为他们重新打造理想的住家。过程中也会分享许多室内设计与装潢的贴士及好去处。.

programme.title: 星期二特写: 动物情缘 Tuesday Report: My Furry BFF - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) (重)国家经济越繁华富裕，生活安定，关怀动物与饲养动物的人也似乎越来越多，有些人为了调剂生活，有些人为了兴趣嗜好，有些人顺应潮流，有些人却以宠物作为心灵或精神上的寄托。关怀与爱护动物的人怀着各种不同的心态，这个系列探讨了动物与国人之间的微妙关系以及他们背后的故事。.

programme.title: 我的万里挑一 My One In A Million - EP 25

By then, she could even be 60 years old, but Ding Yi is willing to wait for her. Her grandaunt realises that she could not see the red thread of fate after matchmaking 9999 couples, and she tells Shu Yu that this number could be the key. Shu Yu laments that she does not know how long it will take to matchmake so many couples. Knowing this, will Ding Yi still be willing to wait for her? (PG)(重)(大结局)书彧告诉定一她必须等到看不到红线时，才能像普通人一样谈恋爱，届时说不定她已经60岁，定一说他可以等。姨婆发现她是在撮合了9999对男女之后，才看不到红线的，告诉书彧也许这个数目是关键。书彧感叹不知何年何月才能撮合这么多的情侣，定一会愿意等她吗？.

programme.title: 老友万岁 Old Is Gold - EP 63
programme.desc: (R) Ping Pong meets Sister Mi by chance, and finds out that she is on her way to take revenge. He plays a prank on Sister Mi, and almost causes her to face retaliation from her enemy. When Uncle Lotter's health checkup results are out, Ping Pong finds out that his grandfather has a brain tumour, and has less than six months to live. Ping Pong can't help but have an emotional outburst in front of Xin Xin. programme.title: 芈月传 The Legend Of Miyue - EP 61
programme.desc: (R) Presided by Empress Dowager Hui, a meeting to elect the new king of Qin results in a violent conflict between the loyalists of Prince Hua and Prince Hui. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)惠后召集大臣与众公子开会，以商讨册立储君之事，结果公子华与公子恢互不相让，两派人马大打出手，公子恢在恶斗中，遭公子华一剑毙命。与此同时，身在燕国的黄歇，有幸遇见了赢稷，从而找到了芈月。.

programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 入侵者 Doppelganger - EP 18
programme.desc: (R) Rui Jie pushes Si Ting into the sea. Fortunately, she is rescued by Li Wei. Li Wei tells Rui Jie about the evidence he has against him, aggravating a fight between them. Jian Ting steps forward to intervene. He reveals that he knew about Rui Ming's murder offence and has been feigning dementia. Li Wei is shocked beyond words, not expecting that he was made a scapegoat for Rui Ming's crime. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)锐杰将思婷推下海，幸被立威所救。立威以证据揭发锐杰，两人大打出手，被建廷喝止。原来锐明曾经杀人，当时建廷决定报警，不料被人从后面击晕，幸好拣回一条命，便假装痴呆。立威听了很震惊，没想到自己还替锐明背了杀人的罪名。.

programme.title: 我是媒体人 Beyond The Cameras - EP 1
programme.desc: Yeu Her and Kano are the first 2 trainees to report for the Variety Assistant Producer role. Do they know what exactly does a Variety Assistant Producer do in TV productions? Stay tuned! 节目为5个职位招募10位练习生，分组接受培训，首先上阵的两位练习生- 高雨荷和吕妤庭，她们对综艺助理编导的工作了解多少？报到的第一天，她们经历了什么让她们大开眼界的人与事？进摄影棚碰到接二连三的状况，她们应付得了吗？有人甚至不胜压力而掉泪，她是谁？千万记得锁定！.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 新加坡篇 All Is Well - Singapore - EP 1
programme.desc: A cargo ship has set sail from the Philippines. Ship member Ma Dong Bao and his subordinates kill off everyone on the ship, but Cai Fu Lai survives the ordeal. Fu Lai wakes up and escapes with the use of a lifeboat. The cargo ship has been used by Long Hang, a Taiwanese company, for smuggling. It is managed by Wu Pin Rui, and is under investigation by the Taiwanese authorities. Guo Hao Sen becomes the target of Xiao Ai, who is determined to marry into a rich family. (PG-部分画面令人不安)货船“孝亲号”在菲律宾外海航行，船员马东宝带着小弟杀死船上的人，却留下了蔡富莱这个活口。富莱醒来，乘救生艇逃离大船。“孝亲号”是台湾龙航公司的走私船只，由吴品睿管理，台湾警方正在追查。郭豪森被派来新加坡腾升银行当总经理，一心想嫁入豪门的筱艾将他视为目标。.

programme.desc: Within the Hong Kong Police, there is a mysterious department known as the "7th Action Team" who specialises in investigating supernatural cases that can't be explained with science. programme.title: 梦想的声音 3 Sound Of My Dream S3 - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) A music variety where a number of talented singers, amateur or otherwise are given the chance to "challenge" a celebrity tutor by singing one of the celebrity's songs. In exchange, the celebrity is assigned one of four randomly selected songs and has three hours to come up with a cover performance of this song. (重)与上季相同，基本模式为星素挑战，由追梦歌手对导师发起讨教（挑战）。但在第三季开始，选歌模式已经更换为第一季的模式，可是选择权是由参赛者说“开始”的时候，只要喊“停”，那一首歌曲就是讨教老师要唱的歌。和第一季不一样的是，每一首歌都有关键词。如果进行第二轮讨教，是没有任何的关键词。时间也从之前的6个小时改成3个小时。据华少声称，如果“惊”曲榜里的歌曲原唱者是导师的话，讨教歌手若是选择原唱者导师，将会带来的难度和风险更大，最终导致讨教失败。这一季的歌手包括林俊杰，王嘉尔，胡彦斌，张靓颖，谭维维 等。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 3 Sound Of My Dream S3 - EP 3

programme.title: 信号 Signal - EP 17
programme.desc: (R) Zhishou decides to tell Haiying the truth about the Renzhou high school rape case and asks Haiying to meet him in front of the Renzhou Hospital. However, he is dead by the time Haiying arrives. Xiuxian is shocked and saddened after learning that Caihan was killed by Zhishou many years ago. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)治守打电话给海英要告诉他当年仁州女高中生案件的真相，约了他在仁州医院前见面。可是当海英到达时，发现治守已遭人杀害。当秀贤得知治守当年亲手杀了材韩一事后，感到十分惊讶和难过。.

programme.title: 小当家 Little Maestros - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Abandoned at birth, Ding Yan was adopted 12 years ago. Her foster father found work in another town, leaving her as a stay-at-home child to shoulder the task to care for her ill grandparents. Why is she willing to take up such chores and farm work, giving her all for a family without blood relation? (重)丁燕是一名弃婴，12年前，她被人收养。但养父在她很小的时候就外出打工，她成了留守儿童，在家中负起照顾生病的爷爷和奶奶的责任。是什么令她愿意承担起所有的家务和农活，撑起一个毫无血缘关系的家呢？.

programme.title: 金星火星大不同 Mars Vs Venus - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Why are Singaporean women not marriage material? Are Singaporean men simply not good enough? Formal TV presenter Diana Ser joins the panel this week and shares her thoughts on this juicy topic. What will the Martians do to protect their pride and dignity? Let's find out! (重)久违了的美丽人妻徐秀盈首次上节目！身为新加坡女人，她是否认为新加坡女人嫁不出全都是受新加坡男人牵连？郑斌辉和苏梽诚要如何反驳和争辩，为新加坡男人保住立场！看了这集，你会对新加坡女人和男人有不同的看法！.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 28
programme.desc: (R) Yuzhi introduces Xiantai to a Mr Huang who orders 3000 jackets from Xiantai. Unexpectedly, Mr Huang disappears without making payment after receiving the goods. Xiantai is suspected of receiving bribes from Mr Huang. Yinghao wants Xiantai to resign and take responsibility of the losses suffered by the company. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)宇植在载永的指使下安排一位假社长向贤泰订购三千套团体服。该社长在收货后失联，令KP集团收不到付款，贤泰还被闭路电视拍到疑似收取贿赂的画面。英鎬要贤泰辞职，为公司蒙受的损失负责。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Cui Yingen confides to Guo Xian that she has been diagnosed with acute leukaemia and left with two years life. She hopes Guo Xian can take care of her. Enzai gets anxious learning that her brother, Yuzai, has been injured in a site accident. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)崔英恩告诉郭贤她患了急性骨髓性白血病，可能只有两年的命，希望郭贤这段时间能照顾她。恩在得知弟弟宇在在地盘现场受了伤，大感焦急。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 13
programme.desc: Zhi-an skips a lesson to rush to Zhixiu's side when she finds out that Zhixiu is drunk. Mingxi is displeased with Zhi-an's behaviour and orders for everything that can remind Zhi-an of the Xus to be thrown away. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)知安拨电给知秀时发现知秀喝醉了，于是立刻翘课赶到知秀的身边。明熙大为不悦，要闵部长把能够勾起知安对徐家的眷恋的物品一律丢掉，令知安难过不已。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 14
programme.desc: Zhi-an attempts to climb over the wall to retrieve her belongings that have been thrown away by Mingxi. Daojing stops her. He returns Zhi-an's prized wood figurines to her and also brings her out for a drink. Daojing's thoughtfulness enables Zhi-an to change her impression of him. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)知安尝试爬墙到屋外出去找被明熙丢掉的东西，却被道京逮个正着。道京把知安的木雕还给她，还带知安去喝啤酒。两人的关系因此改善。.

programme.title: 北京到莫斯科 Beijing To Moscow - EP 10
programme.desc: After finding Mei Ling, she reveals that she met Kloudiia in church. Kloudiia had turned to the church to help cope with her grief of losing An Ran and the reason for Kloudiia's suicide attempt triggered Kai Xiang's memories to flood back in. While Kai Xiang was preparing for his wedding, An Ran had a terrible accident that left him fighting for his life. At a loss of what to do, Kloudiia begged Kai Xiang to return to Moscow to see his son. (PG)美玲是Kloudiia在教会认识的好友，在她初遇Kloudiia时，Kloudiia正处于崩溃的边缘。是她一直陪伴Kloudiia，帮她走出人生低谷。原来Kloudiia还活着，不过孩子已经不在了！当时Kloudiia是因为突如其来的丧子之痛才崩溃选择自杀。Kloudiia自杀丧子的真相，刺激了凯翔，也揭开了他逃婚的谜底。原来凯翔和筱琦筹备婚礼时，安然却遇上严重意外，危在旦夕。慌张失措的Kloudiia恳求凯翔到莫斯科一趟，见他们的孩子安然最后一面。.

programme.title: 混口饭吃而已 Hear My Thoughts - EP 10
programme.desc: Familiar real-life scenarios with hilarious caricature, Hear My Thoughts brings to attention the bottled-up sentiments of people at their workplace. 幽默短片《混口饭吃而已》，以逗趣的方式叙述各行各业的酸甜苦辣！打工仔的内心喊话及苦衷——只有自己最清楚，真相也绝非你所能想象！演员阵容包括：田铭耀、鐘琴、王智荟、胡佳嬑、坤华、罗翊绮及林茜茜，还有客串嘉宾周崇庆、权怡凤、朱厚任等。.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 1
programme.desc: A cargo ship sailed quietly along the offshore of The Philippines. A crew member, Ma Dong Bao, smuggled people up the ship and killed the rest of the members, leaving only Cai Fu Lai, the chef, to live. Cai Fu Lai, Eric and Dong Huang are good friends who grew up together. Eric faked his education credentials to work at Singapore's Teng Sheng Bank, but his act gets exposed by Linda, the director, and is threatened by her. (PG-些许暴力画面)(首播)菲律宾外海，货船“孝亲号”安静地航行。船员马东宝暗中带人上船，杀死其他船员，只留下厨师蔡富莱一个活口。蔡富莱与Eric、栋煌是一起长大的好友。Eric假造学历进入新加坡腾升银行工作，被主管Linda识破而威胁他。Eric被逼下，答应网友Justin邀请，到台湾参加提款测试……。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: Fresh!新登场 – 佩佩 Fresh Takes - Pei Pei
programme.desc: (R) "Fresh Takes" is a series of 10 local short films directed and produced by Mediacorp artistes Bryan Wong, Romeo Tan, Shane Pow, Priscelia Chan, Joanne Peh and Ian Fang, as well as production teams from Mediacorp Chinese Drama, Studiomonki, Wawa Pictures and August Pictures. (PG)(重)一位深藏在记忆中的女儿，明明是最亲的人，却无法释出关心的一面。女儿的心永远漂浮不定，思念着家乡却没有勇气回到父亲身旁了。佩佩离开乌敏岛到新加坡独自生活，认识了性感美女Tracy和豪爽帅气的阿哲三人成为好朋友。在两人的影响下，佩佩靠自己的才华慢慢成为网红。一段裸露影片在网络中流传，三人的关系进而发生巨大的变化。正寿等不到回家吃饭的女儿，决定与女儿的好友阿健一起到新加坡寻找佩佩，才发现记忆中最亲近的女儿已经不是自己想象中的样子，女儿在新加坡遭遇的事情成为父亲心里最痛的那根刺。最后，父亲决定回到家乡，等待女儿回来，然而佩佩是否会回到父亲的身边呢？.

programme.title: 百味人生 Food Of Life - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Life and death is a natural cycle of life. People pay last respect to the deceased and express their loss through funeral rituals. Funeral is the most serious event in life and each ethnic groups has their own unique funeral customs and food culture. Food brings the people closer in mourning period. (重)(最后一集)生死循环，生命的自然定律。人们借着丧礼给离世的人最后的敬礼。丧礼是人生中最为严肃的礼仪，让亲友表达对死者的思念。各民族都有其独特的丧葬文化，丧葬活动有饮食文化的介入，同吃共食拉近了人们的心理距离。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 29
programme.desc: (R) Zaiyong instructs Mr Huang to release the jackets at low prices, leading franchisees to ask KP Group for an explanation. KP Group faces its greatest crisis since the start of its operations. Xiantai is arrested for dereliction of duty. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)载永指使冒牌社长将之前到手的外套以低价抛出市面，令总公司难以向加盟店的社长们交待。 KP集团面临创业以来最大的危机。贤泰以渎职罪被KP集团提告。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Enzai's father requests Guo Xian to forge his medical report in order to claim his insurance. Enzai overheard and reprimanded her father. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)恩在的父亲叫郭贤在他的医诊报告上作假，好让他领到保险金，此时恩在听到了出言阻止。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 15
programme.desc: Xiuya goes for a makeover in an attempt to forget Zhitai. Her new look attracts the attention of a lawyer, but Xiuya dismisses him as she is constantly reminded of Zhitai. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)秀雅为了忘了知泰，到美容院改头换面一番，成功被一名帅气的律师搭讪，却因为想到知泰而拒绝律师的追求。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 16
programme.desc: Mingxi goes to an art gallery with a group of socialites. One of them reveals that Mingxi has found her long-lost daughter. Mingxi has no choice but to ask Zhi-an to show up at the art gallery when the socialites demand to see her. Zhi-an impresses everyone with her art knowledge. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)明熙与太太们一起到美术馆赏画，出乎意料地被一位名媛揭穿她已经找到女儿的事。太太们要求与知安见面，明熙骑虎难下，要知安立刻出席聚会。知安以出色的美术知识令在场的太太们对她刮目相看。.

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 1
programme.desc: 'A Literary Feast' features delectable dishes from renowned literary novels, and explores the hidden stories behind each dish. Discover the art of cuisine behind the traditional flavours of these impeccable legendary dishes. (首播)《笔墨间的飨宴》节目将呈现各地不同名著、地方传说相关的种种美食。在挑动观众味蕾的同时，探讨各地传说美食背后的人文故事与饮食文化，进一步了解吃的艺术。.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 2
programme.desc: Eric and Dong Huang unknowingly get involved in an ATM heist after participating in the test. Justin deceives Eric about the program being bought by a security company and they would pay him, putting Eric at ease. Teng Sheng Bank found that the ATM was attacked by hackers and 80 million was "robbed". Vice president Guo Yan Feng ordered the police and media to keep it a secret, however, the news still spread online, and rookie reporter Liu Wei Yun finds out about the incident. (PG)Eric、栋煌因参加测试而卷入提款机盗领案，却不自知。Justin欺骗Eric有关程序已被一资安公司买下，并付款给他，Eric感放心。腾升银行发现提款机被骇客攻击，盗领8千万，副总裁郭延丰下令对警方和媒体保密，然而网路上还是传出风声，被菜鸟记者刘维芸发现。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 3
programme.desc: Two years after a catastrophic earthquake struck Nepal, there are many who continue to live with the repercussions of the seismic disaster. Homes have not been fully rebuilt leaving victims without shelter, and schools are still in the process of being repaired. Host Paul Foster hooks up with his Nepalese friends to undertake a tough, dangerous and exhilarating 14-hour drive up the mountains in a special delivery of masonry that will help rebuild schools. 六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 未来的食物工厂 Savouring the Future - EP 3
